The Grid: Platform

Working designs of the Grid platform. A collection of conceptualisations of what is currently being developed. *Subject to change for something more awesome.

item.title: Pictures for Writing Ideas
item.description:
Pictures for Writing Ideas

Hello imgur! I have gathered these 5 pictures for use when I write short stories. I'm still a rookie but really enjoy writing these stories. If imgur is interested miught I post some of my work for you all to (hopefully) enjoy and constructively criticize? I'd much appreciate it!

item.title: The AI Revolution: Our Immortality or Extinction | Wait But Why
item.description:
The AI Revolution: Our Immortality or Extinction | Wait But Why

We have what may be an extremely difficult problem with an unknown time to solve it, on which quite possibly the entire future of humanity depends. - Nick Bostrom Welcome to Part 2 of the "Wait how is this possibly what I'm reading I don't get why everyone isn't talking about this" series.

item.title: A History of Graphic Design: Chapter 42; The Swiss Grid System -- and the Dutch Total Grid
item.description:
A History of Graphic Design: Chapter 42; The Swiss Grid System -- and the Dutch Total Grid

After the second world war the Swiss Grid Style, also known as the International Typographic Style was developed by Swiss designers, such as Armin Hofmann, Josef MÃ¼ller Brockmann, Max Bill, Richard P Lohse, Hans Neuberg, and Carlo Vivarelli who began to experiment with typography and photo-montage.

item.title: The AI Revolution: Road to Superintelligence - Wait But Why
item.description:
The AI Revolution: Road to Superintelligence - Wait But Why

Note: The reason this post took three weeks to finish is that as I dug into research on Artificial Intelligence, I could not believe what I was reading. It hit me pretty quickly that what's happening in the world of AI is not just an important topic, but by far THE most important topic for our future.
